Translations.Text: When ili entered his kvartal ili dir Pac. Li dir Ni est apprehensive pri vi
Ili dir ne est apprehensive. Ni hav bon news vi enlightened fil
Li dir Kiel vi don me such bon news when mi est tial old? Vi ankoraux don me this bon news
Ili dir bon news ni don vi est prav; do ne despair
Li dir Neniom despairs his Lord's mercy escept strayers
Li dir Ki est your misi O messengers
Ili dir Ni depesx kulp popol
As por Lot's famili ni sav them all
Ne his wife; sxi destin est kun des doomed
Li dir Vi est unknown popol
Ili dir Ni bring vi ki ili dub
Ni bring vi truth; ni est truthful
Vi sorb your famili nokt. Rest them far sure ke neniom da vi rigard dors! Ir rekt as komand
Ni liver him this komand those popol est annihilated en des maten
Li dir These est my gast; ne embarrass me
Ili dir ni ne enjoin vi Did el kontakt anyone
